name: 御剑传说
description: , in the game the player needs to control is a, practice 10,000 swords to return to the family, the hero, cultivation, survival, the game early, the maximum amount of blood a hero can wield is 12. The number of swords he can wield is 12. Killing elite monsters will drop blood and wield swords, but the survival of the hero must be guaranteed. If the amount of blood is zero, the hero needs to start cultivating and living again. The left mouse button, the sword, the operation in the game is very simple. Click the left mouse button, one sword after another will attack, for the player to control, the right mouse button, Homecoming, clicking the right button of the mouse would retrieve all the swords in the scene. In the later stages of the game, it would have the effect of 10,000 swords returning to the clan. As the duration of the game increased, the number of swords that could be used would increase, can practice to the legend, 10,000 swords return to the clan
